summary: This is an email from Patricia Anne Pileggi dated November 17, 2021, listing former HRD employees (Leanne Jacone, Laura Boothe, Carol Ash) with their employment date ranges. The document is marked as subject to a protective order and contains a standard confidentiality notice.

persons.name: Patricia Anne Pileggi
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email listing former HRD employees and their employment periods.

persons.name: Leanne Jacone
persons.context: Listed as a former HRD employee with employment dates from October 17, 2005 to December 1, 2006.

persons.name: Laura Boothe
persons.context: Listed as a former HRD employee with employment dates from July 17, 2001 to December 3, 2004.

persons.name: Carol Ash
persons.context: Listed as a former HRD employee with possible employment from 1994 to 2001.

keyFacts: The document lists three former HRD employees: Leanne Jacone (10/17/2005-12/01/2006), Laura Boothe (07/17/2001-12/03/2004), and Carol Ash (possibly 1994-2001).
The email is marked 'SUBJECT TO PROTECTIVE ORDER' specifically for paragraphs 7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17, indicating restricted legal disclosure.
The document contains a standard attorney-client privilege confidentiality notice, suggesting it may be part of legal proceedings or discovery.
The email is flagged as '[EXTERNAL]', indicating it was sent outside the sender's organization.
The document reference 'EFTA00159884' and 'EFTA_000 10236' suggests it is part of a larger document set, possibly related to the Epstein case.
